meanings.definition: To process (ores or other raw materials) for profit.
meanings.sent1: The company will beneficiate the iron ore to make money.
meanings.sent2: Miners beneficiate the raw materials to sell them at a higher price.
meanings.sent3: The clever businessman decided to beneficiate the rocks into precious gems.
meanings.sent4: She beneficiated the clay of creativity to sculpt a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The process of beneficiating the soil turned it into a valuable resource.

meanings.definition: To treat (a substance) to make it more beneficial or valuable.
meanings.sent1: Farmers beneficiate the soil to improve crop growth.
meanings.sent2: The scientist beneficiated the medicine to enhance its effectiveness.
meanings.sent3: The chef beneficiated the ingredients to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: She beneficiated her skincare routine with natural products.
meanings.sent5: The teacher beneficiated the lesson with interactive activities.
